text:
The distribution directory http://xml.apache.org/commons/dist/ has files that 
are out of date.  It shows resolver 1.0 instead of 1.1, for example.
creator: bobs@sagehill.net

text: How exactly is this bug entry related to the commons-attributes project?
creator: skitching@apache.org
leo.sutic@inspireinfrastructure.com
text: Moving this bug to the right project.

creator: crossley@apache.org
text:
Thanks Bob for reporting this issue. Sorry that it has taken so long to attend
to it. First it went to the wrong project, then we somehow missed it.

Today i added a webserver redirect from that old xml.apache.org/commons/dist/
directory to the proper one.

However, i would like to know how you came to be looking at that old directory.
Was there a link that you followed? We need to fix it. People should always go
via the mirrors (http://xml.apache.org/mirrors.cgi) and never direct to /dist/
